description: Try our easy to follow Bruemar Slow Cooked Vietnamese Pork Belly Pieces With Jasmine Rice recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Bruemar Slow Cooked Vietnamese Pork Belly Pieces With Jasmine Rice Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500g slow cooked Vietnamese style pork belly pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Discard the box & remove the product from the packaging.
Transfer the product to an ovenproof dish & cover with foil.
Bake for 40 minutes, removing the foil for the last 10 minutes of cooking.
To prepare rice, rinse rice in cold water. Place rice in a saucepan with 2 cups of cold water and bring to the boil.
Reduce heat and simmer covered for 15 minutes or until moisture is absorbed.
Remove from heat and let stand covered for 5 minutes.
Fluff rice with a fork before serving.
